text:
@KILLBILLEVOL1 @3rdHausSon I tried.
They said I couldn't donate blood without a coronavirus diagnosis. The doctors didn't test me for the virus when I was sick in February. I had symptoms all the way until mid April. Neither doctors nor Red Cross would give me an antibody test. I could've helped months ago https://t.co/2hUjZemGsN

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
